body_html: Sorry for the delay. The PR has been updated. Now a new op tf.contrib.framework.where is exposed so that the broadcast rule follows numpy conventions. The original tf.where remains intact. Please take a look.
body_text: Sorry for the delay. The PR has been updated. Now a new op tf.contrib.framework.where is exposed so that the broadcast rule follows numpy conventions. The original tf.where remains intact. Please take a look.
body: Sorry for the delay. The PR has been updated. Now a new op `tf.contrib.framework.where` is exposed so that the broadcast rule follows numpy conventions. The original `tf.where` remains intact. Please take a look.
